Reverend Billy na Ụka ​​Kwụsị Ịzụ ahịa bụ obodo na-arụ ọrụ siri ike dabere na New York City.  Ndị Choir Stop Shopping so onye nkwusa na-atọ ọchị, Reverend Billy, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri William (Billy) Talen gosipụtara.  Nkà ihe ọmụma nke Ụka Kwụsị Ịzụ ahịa gbara gburugburu "Shopocalypse" dị nso, nke na-eche na njedebe nke mmadụ ga-abịa site na ịzụ ahịa manic.
